first-line: I’ve tried to reach you a few times but still haven’t heard back … which tells me one of three things:
second-line: #1). You’re not interested and I should stop bothering you.
third-line: #2). You’re interested but haven’t had the time to respond yet.
forth-line: #3). You’ve fallen and can’t get up (and in that case, let me know and I’ll call someone to help you!) …
fifth-line: Please let me know which one as I’m starting to worry!
